sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SEQUANI, a people anciently forming a part of Gallia Celtica, but annexed to Belgica by Augustus, separated from the Helvetii by Mount Jura, with the Rhine on the east, bordering on the Ædui and Segustiani to the south, and Lingones to the west ; now Franche Comté.
